commands.search.description: Search templates by keyword/type/label; optionally deep search content
commands.search.args.keyword: Search keyword (optional, can use filters only)
commands.search.flags.label: Filter by labels (supports multiple, comma-separated)
commands.search.flags.deep: Trigger ripgrep to deep search template content
commands.show.flags.repo: Explicitly specify source repository alias in multi-repo scenarios
commands.show.flags.output: Output value of specified attribute path
commands.apply.description: Apply templates to project files. Supports context/prompt/raw content sources
commands.apply.flags.context: Load context type template and write according to targets
commands.apply.flags.prompt: Load prompt type template and write its content to specified file
commands.apply.flags.content: Use local file text content to write directly to specified path
commands.apply.flags.stdin: Read text to write from standard input
commands.apply.flags.filename: Specify landing file name when --dest is a directory
commands.apply.flags.dry_run: Only show files to be modified, don't execute actual writes
commands.apply.flags.repo: Explicitly specify source repository alias in multi-repo scenarios
commands.init.flags.repo: Add a default template repository during initialization
commands.init.flags.name: Specify alias for --repo
commands.repo.list.description: List repos in current effective config
commands.repo.add.description: Add template repository to config and clone to local cache directory
commands.repo.add.flags.name: Specify alias for repository
commands.repo.update.description: Update specified or all repositories (git pull) and refresh index
commands.repo.update.args.alias: Repository alias (optional, updates all if not specified)
commands.repo.remove.description: Remove repository from config and optionally clean local cache directory
